item.title: Create 30 Second Video clips for social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We create a number of high level interviews with senior executives and before we post these videos we also create 30 second highlight videos of each interview that is uploaded on Linkedin in with a link to the main video for people to view.

I have provided an example of the video and style that we would need to be created. I will then be able to provide you with the full interview and you would have to create one similar to what has been provided.
https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/875770170 (Full Interview)

https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/937504865/5508556ad5 (30 Second Video)

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 27, 2024 07:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for YouTube Vlog - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to join our team and work on editing vlogs for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to create engaging and visually appealing videos. You will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding transitions, sound effects, music, and graphics to enhance the overall quality of our vlogs. Attention to detail and the ability to work under tight deadlines are crucial.
  Skills needed:
  - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Knowledge of color grading and color correction
  - Familiarity with motion graphics and visual effects
  - Strong communication and collaboration skills
  - Ability to follow creative direction and work independently
  - Portfolio showcasing previous work in vlog editing is a plus

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 27, 2024 07:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Creator for Mobile App Explanation - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video creator who can produce a captivating video to explain our mobile app. The video should effectively showcase the features and benefits of our app in an engaging manner. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating product explainer videos and possess a strong understanding of visual storytelling.
  Responsibilities:
  - Develop a script and storyboard for the video
  - Create high-quality animations and graphics
  - Coordinate with our team to gather necessary information and assets
  - Edit and refine the video to ensure a polished final product
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong creative and storytelling abilities
  - Experience in creating product explainer videos
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  - Attention to detail
  This is a medium-sized project that requires attention to detail and creative flair. The project is expected to be completed within 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate level video creator who has a portfolio showcasing similar work. If you have a passion for creating compelling videos and are excited about our app, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 27, 2024 06:51 UTC
Category: Mobile App Development
Skills:Android, iOS, Video Production, Smartphone, Animation
Skills: Android, iOS, Video Production, Smartphone, Animation
Country: South Africa
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Influencers Needed for Magnesium Supplement Promos - $60-$80/hr - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are a well-known health supplement brand specializing in magnesium products. We are looking for TikTok influencers to create and post short promotional videos for our product on their TikTok accounts. This is a great opportunity to collaborate with a reputable brand and showcase your creativity.

Tasks:

Create engaging and high-quality promotional videos for our magnesium supplement
Post the videos on your TikTok account
Follow our guidelines and scripts to highlight the key features and benefits of our product
Include shopping links or shopping carts in the videos to facilitate purchases

Work Schedule:

Flexible working hours, can be done from home
Long-term task with potential for ongoing collaboration
Compensation:

$60-$80 per hour
Free product samples for the promotional videos
15-20% commission on sales, which goes to the creator

Requirements:

Active TikTok account with a follower count of at least 1,000
Experience in creating and editing TikTok videos
Ability to follow instructions and meet deadlines
Ability to include shopping links or shopping carts in the videos

How to Apply:
Please submit your TikTok handle and a brief introduction about your experience. Include links to your previous work or TikTok videos.



Hourly Range: $60.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 06:44 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok
Skills: TikTok
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Expert needed to edit 3 videos - 3mins each - Upwork
item.description:
An expert video editor needed to edit 3 videos.
Duration per video: 3 mins  

What you will receive:
1. Clear instructions for EACH video.
2. Short raw video clips (a speaker talking)

What I need you to do:
1. Add subtitles
2. Add banner
3. Background music relevant to my niche - digital business
4. 2 days turnaround time, with an update of edits in 24 hours, and another final update in 24 hours.

Sample Videos:
1. https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?id=1832550780590246
2. https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?active_status=all&ad_type=political_and_issue_ads&country=SG&id=491646949914528&view_all_page_id=1690887311230169&search_type=page&media_type=all
3. https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?id=930218018904897
4. https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?id=366150313245009

*****If you're interested, please follow these instructions carefully******

1. Send me your 2-3 best video editing samples ONLY (videos longer than 5 mins will not be watched)
2. Provide 3 time slots when you're available for a 15-minute Zoom call.
3. If we decide to work together, you will assist me with 1 out of 3 videos.  I will fund you for 1 video and pay you USD 50 upon completing the edits within 24 hours. If I am satisfied with your work, I will provide you with the remaining 2 videos to edit.

*****please DO NOT apply if******
1. You are not available to complete this first video assignment in the next 24 hours
2. You are not available for a video Zoom call
3. You are not keen to do 1 video for me at USD50

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 06:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Singapore
click to apply
